Description: Time period in quarters (Quarter notation)
Gross Domestic Product - total value of goods and services produced
Government revenues - total income collected by the state
Government expenditures - total spending by the state
Population nominal income - total gross income of households
Population deposits in banks - total savings in banking system
Average monthly salary - mean wage per worker
Foreign trade turnover - total value of exports and imports
Exports - value of goods and services sold abroad
Imports - value of goods and services purchased from abroad
Monetary base - total amount of currency in circulation and reserves
Oil price (Brent crude) - international benchmark for crude oil
Construction and installation work expenses - spending on construction projects
Consumer expenditures - household spending on goods and services
Residential construction investments - capital directed to housing projects
Housing prices - average cost of residential properties
Discount rate - key interest rate set by Central Bank
Cumulative sales - running total of loan sales from start of period
Cash loan sales - TARGET VARIABLE: quarterly loan disbursements to customers
Total loans issued to customers - outstanding loan portfolio
Non-Performing Loans - loans in default or close to default (>90 days overdue)
Return on Assets - profitability ratio (Net Income / Total Assets)
Return on Equity - profitability ratio (Net Income / Shareholder Equity)
Net Interest Margin - difference between interest income and interest paid
Efficiency Ratio - operating expenses as percentage of revenue (lower is better)
Loan-to-Deposit Ratio - loans divided by deposits (liquidity indicator)
Number of customers - total active clients in the quarter
